title: Do narcissists make better poets than novelists? - Quora

response.answer_text: I really do not know the answer to that, I guess if they are the creative type. My Narc was intimidated by the fact that I am An Author, although he was enthralled when I told him I would put him on the cover, which I never did..good thing because we are no longer in a relationship, and I would have had to remove his pic from my cover and select another model.. Regards, Author Dia Stone

Several contolled studies have been published over the years about the association between mood disorders and creativity in writers. Notably, 80% had a mood disorder; 30% of these a bi-polar disorder, especially prevalent among poets. However, the sample sizes were relatively small. Narcissism was not among the disorders studied
Whether one is a poet or a novelist is about one’s own creative talent (throw in music writing too), it has nothing to do with being a narc.
